Welcome

Welcome to the official website of Subsurface Studios. We're a group of indie developers coming together to build better games for everyone.

Projects

Compensation Social

Compensation Social is a social multiplayer game, set in the underwater research station Post Vigor. With a rich suite of bleeding-edge UGC tools and an immersive Virtual Reality setting, what's not to love?

Open Source

We pride ourselves on how much of our systems are open source. For example, our API for Compensation Social is 100% open to the public, for viewing and contribution. We accept contributions from open source projects without discrimination or hate.
